column5: I am in need of a lawnmower, gas, very basic, doesn't have to be running, doesn't need to be a self propelled or be a bagger but would like to have something that the wheels and deck are still in reasonable condition.  Same thing with a trimmer, doesn't have to be running but would appreciate something that is still intact so I can fix it up.  If anyone has something they would be willing to part with please send me a pm.
